item.title: oauth2-proxy
item.description:
Description

A reverse proxy that provides authentication with Google, Github or other providers

  • https://github.com/oauth2-proxy/oauth2-proxy
  • https://github.com/oauth2-proxy/manifests

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
oauth2-proxy default ✅ — 0 1 —
oauth2-proxy-redis-master default ❌ — 0 1 —
oauth2-proxy-redis-replica default ❌ — 0 1 —

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

🤖 oauth2-proxy

Namespace: default  |  Automount: ✅

🔑 Permissions (0)

No explicit RBAC bindings.

item.title: redis
item.description:
Description

Redis(R) is an open source, advanced key-value store. It is often referred to as a data structure server since keys can contain strings, hashes, lists, sets and sorted sets.

  • https://github.com/bitnami/charts/tree/main/bitnami/redis

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
redis-master default ❌ — 0 1 —
redis-replica default ❌ — 0 1 —

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

🤖 redis-master

Namespace: default  |  Automount: ❌

item.title: redis-enterprise-operator
item.description:
Description

A Helm chart for Redis Enterprise Operator for Kubernetes

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
redis-enterprise-installer default ❌ — 2 2 Low
redis-enterprise-uninstaller default ❌ — 1 1 Low
redis-enterprise-operator default ❌ — 0 2 —

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

🤖 redis-enterprise-installer

Namespace: default  |  Automount: ❌

🔑 Permissions (2)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags
ClusterRole redis-enterprise-installer apiextensions.k8s.io/customresourcedefinitions create · get · update Low
ClusterRole redis-enterprise-installer core/namespaces patch Low

⚠️ Potential Abuse (1)

The following security risks were found based on the above permissions:
